name: Digital Resistance
description:
After the great battle between the powerful organization of the RCM, which completely controlled the lives of all people, Internet, media, and the organization Digital Resistance, which fought for the freedom and independence of citizens, the world fell into decay. Cities are ruined, every person is under close surveillance and there is not a single lumen and hope for a brighter future.
The former leader of the "Digital Resistance" Dog, who lost his family during this great battle, long ago retired. Everyone he knew died, and the remnants of resistance were dissolved. He burned the remnants of his days at a local bar and sipped the bitterness of loss in strong alcohol.
And so it went until General Mops Fury, the former commander of the Dog, appeared. He told him that not everything was lost, that they had found where the Central Computer was and only the Dog could cope with it.
The main task of the Dog is to go through the total hell, get to the Central Committee and destroy the RCM once and for all. Presenting people hope for tomorrow and a blue sky over their heads.

Features

  • Hardcore platformer, which challenges you!
  • Design levels that allow you to raise your reaction and reflexes to a new level.
  • Enemies and traps! Just one touch and you're dead!
  • Beautiful graphics and nice visual design.
  • A powerful soundtrack, giving strength and confidence in the battle with the world evil!
  • The plot that will not leave you indifferent.
  • Achievement, who will tell all your friends how cool you are!
  • Join the great battle. Release the Internet and the whole world from the terrible corporation of the RCM!
